name: Saave
description: contract that batches SUSHI staking into AAVE xSUSHI (aXSUSHI).

functionDecorators.name: saave
functionDecorators.description: stake `amount` SUSHI into aXSUSHI by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.

functionDecorators.name: saaveTo
functionDecorators.description: stake `amount` SUSHI into aXSUSHI for benefit of `to` by batching calls to `sushiBar` and `aave` lending pool.
